thread.title: Heartbreaking tributes open Grenfell Tower inquiry

title: Heartbreaking tributes open Grenfell Tower inquiry
text:
Heartbreaking tributes open Grenfell Tower inquiry 2:07am EDT - 01:40
Bereaved relatives of victims of the Grenfell Tower fire gave heartbreaking tributes during the public inquiry into the disaster that opened on Monday. The fire killed 71 people in London last year. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Bereaved relatives of victims of the Grenfell Tower fire gave heartbreaking tributes during the public inquiry into the disaster that opened on Monday. The fire killed 71 people in London last year.
